Ethics in the CSE Capstone


Speaker:

Matthew Hertz


Page Content

The mock-class showcases an activity from the undergraduate capstone course. This activity has students think about the ethics of data and how they would respond in the workplace.

Date:

March 11, 2020

Location:

Integrating Ethics and Social Responsibility in Computing Curricula Symposium @ SIGCSE

Resources

  1. https://cs4sg.github.io/resources/slides/2020-ethics-SIGCSE.pptx

Projects

  • Teaching Responsible Computing
